definition: cigarette or pipe tobacco/CL:根[gen1]/smoke/mist/vapour/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/tobacco plant/(of the eyes) to be irritated by smoke

sentences.english: Bamboo tubes are used as hookah.
Cuiping finally realized her act and took the pipe and went out bare foot to the balcony.
sentences.chinese: 倒是翠平猛然醒悟过来，拎着烟袋光着脚跑到阳台上。

sentences.english: The old man is always carrying a tobacco pouch with him.
sentences.chinese: 这老汉总是随身带著烟袋。

sentences.english: Stop puffing on that pipe for a moment, and listen to him.
sentences.chinese: 停一会儿再抽那烟袋，听我讲话。

sentences.english: He began to smoke his pipe with a satisfied air.
sentences.chinese: 他带着满意的神情抽起烟袋来。

sentences.english: Nowadays smoking pipes is no longer a common sight.
sentences.chinese: 现在抽大烟袋已不常见了。

sentences.english: We can also export drinking straw, hookah.
sentences.chinese: 本公司还可出口吸管，水烟袋。

sentences.english: My great grandfather holds a hookah in his hand in the photo.
sentences.chinese: 照片上我的太爷爷手里拿着一个水烟袋。

definition: cigarette or pipe tobacco/CL:根[gen1]/smoke/mist/vapour/CL:縷|缕[lu:3]/tobacco plant/(of the eyes) to be irritated by smoke
cloth pouch open in the middle, forming two bags/jacket worn for Chinese wrestling
Chinese skullcap resembling the skin of half a watermelon
